publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-474 Jim Tolson: Congratulations to the Scottish Team—That the Parliament offers its fullest congratulations to Alex McLeish, all the Scotland players and the backroom staff for their victory against France in the European Championship 2008 qualifier at the Parc des Princes; notes that Scotland had not beaten France in France since 1950; further notes that the goal scored by James McFadden was the first competitive goal France had conceded since Gary Caldwell’s winner against the French team last autumn; further congratulates the team for taking Scotland to top of its qualifying group, and wishes the whole squad success in its remaining European Championship 2008 qualifying games against Ukraine, Georgia and the world champions, Italy.

S3M-474 Jim Tolson: Congratulations to the Scottish Team—That the Parliament offers its fullest congratulations to Alex McLeish, all the Scotland players and the backroom staff for their victory against France in the European Championship 2008 qualifier at the Parc des Princes; notes that Scotland had not beaten France in France since 1950; further notes that the goal scored by James McFadden was the first competitive goal France had conceded since Gary Caldwell’s winner against the French team last autumn; further congratulates the team for taking Scotland to top of its qualifying group, and wishes the whole squad success in its remaining European Championship 2008 qualifying games against Ukraine, Georgia and the world champions, Italy.
